CustomField.description: Defines the notification setting which will be used for Expense Claim Notifications when an Assignment is related to the Pay Schedule. A Client based override can be applied.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the notification setting which will be used for Expense Claim Notifications when an Assignment is related to the Pay Schedule. A Client based override can be applied.
CustomField.label: Expense Claim Notification Setting

lookupFilter.errorMessage: The Expense Notification Setting defined on the Pay Schedule does not have a Record Type of Expense Claim
